titleInfo.title: R-charge thermodynamical spectral sum rule in N=4 Yang-Mills theory

mods.abstract: A sum rule related to the R-current correlator at vanishing three-momentum is derived in the N=4 supersymmetric Yang-Mills field theory at infinite 't Hooft coupling. For reference it is compared to the one in the free field theory, i.e. at the one loop perturbative approximation.
